meanings.sent1: Over time, the cartilage will ossify and become bone.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the injury could ossify if not treated properly.
meanings.sent3: The magical potion accidentally ossified the toy dinosaur into a real one!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed ossified her resolve like a rock.

meanings.definition: A substance that turns into bone.
meanings.sent1: The ossifier in the body helps in the formation of new bone tissue.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the properties of the ossifier found in the skeletal system.
meanings.sent3: The ancient scroll mentioned a rare plant with ossifier properties that could heal broken bones.
meanings.sent4: The ossifier in the soil slowly transformed the buried remains into fossils.
meanings.sent5: The ossifier extracted from certain fish was used in traditional medicine for bone ailments.
